mapper.sql: e.indexId, e.sid, e.caid, e.score, e.content, e.year, e.is_delete, e.inputDate, e.inputName, e.modifyDate, e.modifyName, e.spare1, e.spare2,t.name as tName,t.email,t.sex,t.age,t.onjob,c.name as cName,c.is_use as cIsUse, c.spare1 as cspare,c.spare2 as cspare2,s.name as stuName,cl.name as clName
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from evaluation e left join course_arrange ca on ca.indexId = e.caid left join course c on c.indexId = ca.cid left join teacher t on t.indexId = ca.tid left join student s on s.indexId = e.sid left join classes cl on cl.indexId = s.classId
order by ${orderByClause}

select
from evaluation e left join course_arrange ca on ca.indexId = e.caid left join course c on c.indexId = ca.cid left join teacher t on t.indexId = ca.tid left join student s on s.indexId = e.sid left join classes cl on cl.indexId = s.classId where e.indexId = #{indexid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select e.indexId, e.sid, e.caid, e.score, e.content, e.year, e.is_delete, e.inputDate, e.inputName, e.modifyDate, e.modifyName, e.spare1, e.spare2,t.name as tName,t.email,t.sex,t.age,t.onjob,co.name as cName,co.is_use as cIsUse, co.spare1 as cspare,co.spare2 as cspare2,s.name as stuName,sum(e.score) as evaTotal,count(e.score)as evaCount, round(sum(e.score)/count(e.score),2) as evaAvg,cl.name as clName from evaluation e left join course_arrange coa on coa.indexId = e.caid left join course co on coa.cid = co.indexId left join teacher t on t.indexId = coa.tid left join student s on s.indexId = e.sid left join classes cl on cl.indexId = s.classId where t.indexId = #{tid,jdbcType=INTEGER} group by
${listItem}
mapper.insert: insert into evaluation (indexId, sid, caid, score, content, year, is_delete, inputDate, inputName, modifyDate, modifyName, spare1, spare2) values (#{indexid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{inputname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into evaluation
indexId,
sid,
caid,
score,
content,
year,
is_delete,
inputDate,
inputName,
modifyDate,
modifyName,
spare1,
spare2,
#{indexid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{caid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update evaluation
indexId = #{record.indexid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sid = #{record.sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
caid = #{record.caid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{record.score,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year = #{record.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inputDate = #{record.inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inputName = #{record.inputname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifyDate = #{record.modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyName = #{record.modifyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spare1 = #{record.spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spare2 = #{record.spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update evaluation set indexId = #{record.indexid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sid = #{record.sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, caid = #{record.caid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{record.score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{record.year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{record.isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inputDate = #{record.inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inputName = #{record.inputname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyDate = #{record.modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyName = #{record.modifyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare1 = #{record.spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare2 = #{record.spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update evaluation
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
caid = #{caid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
score = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inputDate = #{inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
inputName = #{inputname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyName = #{modifyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spare1 = #{spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
spare2 = #{spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where indexId = #{indexid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update evaluation set sid = #{sid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, caid = #{caid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, score = #{score,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year = #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inputDate = #{inputdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, inputName = #{inputname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyDate = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyName = #{modifyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare1 = #{spare1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, spare2 = #{spare2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where indexId = #{indexid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
